display_long_description:
Welcome to Real Carrom, where tradition meets modern gaming. Engage in one of the most beloved board games, now enhanced with immersive virtual reality features.

🔳 Game Modes

Black and White: Stay true to the classic Carrom style—pocket your assigned black or white coins before your opponent.

Freestyle: Pocket any coin and rack up points to outscore your rivals.

🔳 Single Player
Test your skills against adaptive AI. Play solo, partner with an AI, or take on multiple AI opponents for endless challenges.

🔳 Multiplayer Magic
Experience seamless multiplayer like never before:

One-on-one duels

Player + AI versus Player + AI battles

Team up with friends against tough opponents

🔳 Immersive Features

Voice Chat: Talk to opponents in real time.

Oculus Avatars: Flaunt your personalized avatar.

Lip-Sync: Bring realism to your matches with natural lip movement.

✨ New Updates

Achievements: Unlock exclusive Carrom assets as you play.

Trick Shots: Show off your precision and style with special challenge shots.

Free Unlocks: Start strong with 3 default strikers, 3 coin sets, and 3 boards, all included.

Rediscover the joy of Carrom, whether you’re a seasoned player or a newcomer. With intuitive controls, lifelike interactions, and fresh updates, Real Carrom promises endless fun, competition, and mastery.

Resolved Issues:
1. Screen shaking issue resolved.
2. Leader board drop dow corrected

Ready to strike? 🎯
